dcterms:creator: P. T. Fretwell
P. Scofield
R. A. Phillips
dcterms:description: A dataset of manually labelled WV-3 imagery used to count Wandering Albatrosses in various nesting colonies, providing high-resolution satellite images for analysis.
dcterms:title: WV-3 imagery of Wandering Albatrosses

dcterms:creator: O. Ronneberger
P. Fischer
T. Brox
dcterms:description: A deep learning architecture designed for image segmentation, utilized in the study for classifying and localizing albatrosses in satellite imagery.
dcterms:title: U-net architecture

dcterms:creator: T. Lin
P. Goyal
R. Girshick
K. He
P. Dollar
dcterms:description: A loss function used to address class imbalance in the dataset, enhancing the training of the model for detecting albatrosses.
dcterms:title: Focal Loss

dcterms:creator: H. Weimerskirch
K. Delord
C. Barbraud
F. Le Bouard
P. G. Ryan
P. Fretwell
C. Marteau
dcterms:description: A dataset providing status and trends of albatross populations in the French southern territories, used to contextualize the conservation status of the species.
dcterms:title: Status and trends of albatrosses in the French southern territories
